title: NO TEXT on the login screen and friends list!!!
body: Does anyone have the same problem??? No text shows on the login screen and friends list?

replies.body:
im having a similar issue where i cant click find match or invite
https://ibb.co/ieFKD5
i cant get into any type of match, it be invite or starting my own

Hmmmm that's a pretty strange error, and not one that I've seen first-hand. There might be some issues with your League configuration files which are messing up what the client is displaying. Let's try forcing those config files to reset first to see if that does the trick. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#wq2), and let me know if that does the trick! If not, shoot me a screenshot so I can more clearly see what exactly is going on.
